sourcesContent:
const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits:2, maximumFractionDigits:2 }) function ResultTable(props){ return ( {props.data.map(yearData=>{ return })}
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
{yearData.year} {formatter.format(yearData.savingsEndOfYear)} {yearData.yearlyInterest} {yearData.savingsEndOfYear - props.initialInvestment - yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year} {formatter.format(props.initialInvestment + yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year)}
) } export default ResultTable;
